column1: Tourette's is like a cough or a sneeze.  Brrrrr!  It isn't contagious like some people think.  Brrrrrrrrr!
Fun?  Brrrrr!  This really isn't all that fun.  Brrr, brrrrrr!
I dunno, I just. Uh. They don't do anything, that's pretty sweet. I dunno, I thought it was funny.
Hey, you wouldn't happen to be Eric Karp-man, would you?
Well, I think this is for you.
